sentences: Franco Marazzi (1926 – September 2014) was an Italian director.
He directed 9 films and shows in 7 years.
He is mostly known for being the director in the Eurovision Song Contest 1956.
Marazzi started his career as a reporter in 1954 in Zürich.
He first directed the Eurovision Song Contest 1956.
In 1958, he was the creator of TSI, which was from the beginning of the communication.
